<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replay decision, if it has one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Iter = InlineSitesFromRemarks.find(Combined);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Iter != InlineSitesFromRemarks.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Iter-&gt;second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Replay Inliner: Inlined &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Callee &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; @ &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; CallSiteLoc &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;DefaultInlineAdvice&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#aa71268864238db3f41e3d6582103e4e2">llvm::InlineCost::getAlways</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;previously inlined&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), ORE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">          EmitRemarks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Replay Inliner: Not Inlined &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Callee &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; @ &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; CallSiteLoc &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A negative inline is conveyed by &quot;None&quot; std::optional&lt;InlineCost&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;DefaultInlineAdvice&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CB, std::nullopt, ORE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                   EmitRemarks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fallback decisions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReplaySettings.ReplayFallback ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replayinlinersettings/#a49a0d94e62049ec7cf29edc327856d0dabfb0ca5162a37ff39298b24afdb84ff7">ReplayInlinerSettings::Fallback::AlwaysInline</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;DefaultInlineAdvice&gt;(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinecost/#aa71268864238db3f41e3d6582103e4e2">llvm::InlineCost::getAlways</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;AlwaysInline Fallback&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">), ORE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        EmitRemarks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReplaySettings.ReplayFallback ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replayinlinersettings/#a49a0d94e62049ec7cf29edc327856d0dae1c27e5eeb260d139f3605de9cf1d84d">ReplayInlinerSettings::Fallback::NeverInline</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A negative inline is conveyed by &quot;None&quot; std::optional&lt;InlineCost&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;unique&lt;DefaultInlineAdvice&gt;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, CB, std::nullopt, ORE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                 EmitRemarks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ReplaySettings.ReplayFallback ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">           <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/replayinlinersettings/#a49a0d94e62049ec7cf29edc327856d0da0a52da7a03a6de3beefe54f8c03ad80d">ReplayInlinerSettings::Fallback::Original</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there&#39;s a registered original advisor, return its decision</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OriginalAdvisor)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OriginalAdvisor-&gt;getAdvice(CB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If no decision is made above, return non-decision</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
